titleStmt.title: The validity of the orders of the Church of England made out against the objections of the papists, in several letters to a gentleman of Norwich that desired satisfaction therein / by Humphrey Prideaux ...
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, Humphrey, 1648-1724.
